properties.areaDesc: Leake, MS; Madison, MS; Attala, MS
properties.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 10 at 12:55PM CST until February 10 at 4:00PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a

* Flash Flood Warning for...
Northern Leake County in central Mississippi...
Attala County in central Mississippi...
Northeastern Madison County in central Mississippi...

* Until 400 PM CST.

* At 1250 PM CST, emergency management reported thunderstorms
producing heavy rain across the warned area. Up to three inches of
rain have already fallen. Flash flooding is already occurring.

HAZARD...Flash flooding caused by thunderstorms.

SOURCE...Emergency management.

IMPACT...Flooding of small creeks and streams, urban areas,
highways, streets and underpasses as well as other
drainage and low lying areas.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Kosciusko, Edinburg, Newport, Hesterville, Renfroe, Cameron, Zama,
Singleton, Thomastown, Mcadams, Possumneck, Smyrna, Ethel, Sallis
and Redwater.

Additional rainfall amounts of up to 2 inches are possible in the
warned area over the next few hours.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

CMAMtext: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 4:00 PM CST. Avoid flooded areas.
